released_features.name: SHAED Marketplace
released_features.description: Multi-channel inventory management system for commercial vehicle dealerships with catalog creation and marketplace integration

released_features.name: SHAED Catalog
released_features.description: Customer-facing catalog platform where buyers can browse, spec, customize, and order vehicles with dealer inventory management

released_features.name: SHAED Hero Page
released_features.description: Dynamic, configurable product showcase interface for any commercial vehicle model

released_features.name: Order Management
released_features.description: Comprehensive web-based management system for complete vehicle order lifecycle from placement to delivery

released_features.name: Upfit Portal
released_features.description: Centralized order management and status tracking system for vehicle upfitting operations

released_features.name: Digital Deal Jackets
released_features.description: Comprehensive document management platform for automotive dealerships to organize sales transaction paperwork

released_features.name: PaperX AI
released_features.description: AI-powered document processing engine that automatically sorts and organizes automotive documents

products.name: Enhanced Upfit Portal
products.description: Expanded upfitting capabilities with spec library, vendor marketplace, and project management

products.name: Commercial Vehicle Valuation & Data Products
products.description: Industry-standard valuation authority for commercial vehicles with comprehensive market intelligence

products.name: Lender Network Integration
products.description: Two-sided marketplace connecting commercial vehicle financing opportunities with specialized lenders

products.name: Charging Infrastructure Planning
products.description: Advisory services for depot charging design, utility coordination, and TCO modeling

products.name: Compliance Management Module
products.description: Automated compliance tracking for DOT, FMCSA, EPA, OSHA, and state regulations

products.name: Pritchard Dashboard (Full Deployment)
products.description: Comprehensive fleet management platform with telematics, predictive maintenance, and commercial EV optimization

products.name: Service Network Integration
products.description: Connect fleets with qualified service providers for maintenance and repairs

products.name: API Platform
products.description: Open API platform for third-party integrations and custom solutions

products.name: Insurance Marketplace
products.description: Connect fleets with commercial vehicle insurance providers offering usage-based and telematics-enabled policies

products.name: Remarketing Optimization (AI-Powered)
products.description: AI-powered remarketing tools to optimize disposal timing, pricing, and channel selection

products.name: International Expansion
products.description: Expand SHAED platform to Canada and Mexico for cross-border fleet operations

products.name: OEM Partnerships & Embedded Solutions
products.description: White-label SHAED platform as OEM-branded fleet lifecycle solution

lifecycle_stages.name: Research & Evaluation
lifecycle_stages.description: Fleet operators research vehicles, compare specifications, and evaluate options

stakeholders.name: End User
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: Provide access to SHAED Marketplace and Catalog for vehicle research. Integrate CommercialEVs.com for comprehensive EV information. Offer Hero Pages for detailed vehicle specifications.

stakeholders.name: Dealer
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: Enable inventory listing on SHAED Marketplace. Provide tools to create customer-facing catalogs and Hero Pages. Train on lead generation and customer engagement.

stakeholders.name: OEM
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: Showcase commercial vehicle models on SHAED Marketplace. Create Hero Pages for each model. Generate qualified fleet leads through platform.

stakeholders.name: Fleet Management Company
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: Provide advisory services using SHAED Catalog and Hero Pages. Integrate Charging Infrastructure Planning for EV adoption assessment.

lifecycle_stages.name: Configuration & Pricing
lifecycle_stages.description: Configure vehicles, obtain upfitting quotes, and finalize pricing

stakeholders.name: Dealer
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: Use Hero Pages for initial pricing. Integrate Upfit Portal for upfitting quotes. Connect to Lender Network for financing pre-qualification.

stakeholders.name: Upfitter
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: Onboard to Upfit Portal for quote management. Provide access to spec library and vendor marketplace. Enable project tracking and customer communication.

stakeholders.name: Body Manufacturer
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: List standard body configurations in Upfit Portal spec library. Enable direct quoting to dealers and fleet operators.

stakeholders.name: Finance
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: Join Lender Network to access qualified commercial vehicle financing opportunities. Integrate with Digital Deal Jackets for documentation.

stakeholders.name: Charging Infrastructure Provider
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: Partner with SHAED for Charging Infrastructure Planning services. Receive qualified project leads with design specifications.

lifecycle_stages.name: Transaction & Documentation
lifecycle_stages.description: Execute transactions, manage documentation, and coordinate delivery

stakeholders.name: Dealer
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: Implement Order Management system for order tracking. Use Digital Deal Jackets for document management. Integrate PaperX AI for automation.

stakeholders.name: Upfitter
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: Use Upfit Portal for work authorization and project execution. Track order status and communicate with dealers and fleet operators.

stakeholders.name: Finance
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: Process financing through Lender Network. Access documentation via Digital Deal Jackets. Expedite deal closures with automated workflows.

stakeholders.name: Grant Administrator
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: Access organized incentive documentation through Digital Deal Jackets. Streamline compliance and incentive claim processing.

stakeholders.name: Insurance
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: Join Insurance Marketplace to offer commercial vehicle policies. Integrate with Order Management for policy issuance at delivery.

lifecycle_stages.name: Delivery & Implementation
lifecycle_stages.description: Coordinate delivery, complete upfitting, and implement infrastructure

stakeholders.name: Dealer
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: Track delivery status through Order Management. Coordinate with upfitters and logistics providers. Manage final documentation.

stakeholders.name: Upfitter
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: Execute upfitting projects tracked in Upfit Portal. Update status in real-time. Coordinate with dealers for final delivery.

stakeholders.name: Logistics
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: Integrate with Order Management for shipment tracking. Provide real-time status updates. Coordinate pickup and delivery schedules.

stakeholders.name: Charging Infrastructure Provider
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: Execute charging infrastructure installations coordinated through Charging Infrastructure Planning. Provide commissioning and training.

lifecycle_stages.name: Operations & Maintenance
lifecycle_stages.description: Manage fleet operations, maintenance, compliance, and optimization

stakeholders.name: Fleet Management Company
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: Deploy Pritchard Dashboard for comprehensive fleet management. Integrate telematics for real-time monitoring. Enable predictive maintenance and compliance tracking.

stakeholders.name: End User
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: Provide access to Pritchard Dashboard for fleet operations. Enable driver behavior monitoring and vehicle health tracking.

stakeholders.name: Maintenance Provider
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: Join Service Network to receive work orders from fleet operators. Integrate with Pritchard Dashboard for service history and predictive maintenance.

stakeholders.name: Telematics Provider
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: Integrate telematics data with Pritchard Dashboard. Provide real-time vehicle tracking, diagnostics, and driver behavior analytics.

stakeholders.name: Insurance
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: Offer usage-based insurance through Insurance Marketplace. Access telematics data for risk assessment and policy pricing.

stakeholders.name: Government Agency
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: Enable compliance tracking through Compliance Management Module. Provide automated reporting for DOT, FMCSA, EPA, and state regulations.

lifecycle_stages.name: Lifecycle Extension & Replacement
lifecycle_stages.description: Optimize remarketing, plan replacements, and extend vehicle lifecycle

stakeholders.name: Fleet Management Company
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: Use Remarketing Optimization for disposal timing and pricing. Access Commercial Vehicle Valuation for replacement planning. Return to SHAED Marketplace for new vehicle acquisition.

stakeholders.name: Remarketing Specialist
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: Access Remarketing Optimization tools and Commercial Vehicle Valuation data. List vehicles on SHAED Marketplace for resale.

stakeholders.name: Dealer
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: Manage trade-in valuations using Commercial Vehicle Valuation. List used inventory on SHAED Marketplace. Support fleet replacement cycles.

stakeholders.name: End User
stakeholders.onboarding_plan: Access SHAED Marketplace for replacement vehicle research. Leverage existing platform relationship for seamless lifecycle continuation.
